name: github-copilot-api-vscode
description: Universal API Gateway for GitHub Copilot. Expose all Copilot models via local OpenAI, Anthropic, Google & Llama compatible APIs. Use with Cursor, LangChain, Agents & more.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint

githubCopilotApi.server.host.description: Host interface used by the local Copilot-compatible HTTP server.

githubCopilotApi.server.enabled.description: Enable or disable the Copilot API server.

githubCopilotApi.server.enableWebSocket.description: Expose the WebSocket realtime endpoint at /v1/realtime. Disabled by default to reduce resource usage.

githubCopilotApi.server.enableHttps.description: Enable HTTPS/TLS encryption for the API server. Auto-generates a self-signed certificate if no certificate paths are configured.

githubCopilotApi.server.tlsCertPath.description: Path to the TLS/SSL certificate file (.pem or .crt).

githubCopilotApi.server.tlsKeyPath.description: Path to the TLS/SSL private key file (.pem or .key).

githubCopilotApi.server.autoStart.description: Automatically start the Copilot API server when VS Code starts.

githubCopilotApi.server.showNotification.description: Show system notifications when the server starts or stops.

githubCopilotApi.server.port.description: Port used by the local Copilot-compatible HTTP server.

githubCopilotApi.server.maxConcurrentReq.description: Maximum number of concurrent Copilot requests processed by the local API gateway.

githubCopilotApi.server.defaultModel.description: Default model identifier exposed by the OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

githubCopilotApi.server.apiKey.description: Optional API key for authentication. Leave empty to disable authentication. Clients must provide this as a Bearer token.

githubCopilotApi.server.enableLogging.description: Enable request/response logging to the output channel for debugging.

githubCopilotApi.server.rateLimitPerMinu.description: Maximum number of requests per minute. Set to 0 to disable rate limiting.

githubCopilotApi.server.defaultSystemPro.description: Default system prompt to inject if none is provided in the request.

githubCopilotApi.server.redactionPattern.description: Regex patterns to redact sensitive information from request history. Each pattern is applied globally and case-insensitively.

githubCopilotApi.server.ipAllowlist.description: List of allowed IP addresses or CIDR ranges. If empty, all IPs are allowed.

githubCopilotApi.server.requestTimeoutSe.description: Request timeout in seconds for Copilot API calls.

githubCopilotApi.server.maxPayloadSizeMb.description: Maximum allowed request payload size in Megabytes (MB).

githubCopilotApi.server.maxConnectionsPe.description: Maximum number of concurrent connections allowed per IP address.

githubCopilotApi.audit.retentionDays.description: Number of days to retain audit logs. Set to 0 to disable automatic deletion.

githubCopilotApi.audit.logRequestBodies.description: Whether to log full request and response bodies in the audit trail. WARNING: This may log sensitive data.

githubCopilotApi.mcp.servers.description: Configuration for MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Map server names to their configurations (command, args, env, or url for SSE).

githubCopilotApi.mcp.enabled.description: Enable or disable MCP support globally.
